SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Model.Card

Class SymbolEffect

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Model.Card.SymbolEffect
All Implemented Interfaces:
GoalEffect, PlayableEffect, Serializable
public class SymbolEffect extends Object implements GoalEffect, PlayableEffect
Represents an effect of type "symbol". It is used, for example, for all cards that give points depending on groups of visible symbols
See Also:
